data.title: New York LaGuardia Airport (LGA) Travel, Transport: Travel at Airports in New York Area, NY, USA
meta_keywords: located alongside bowery bay flushing bay laguardia international airport lga well-equipped ground transportation options would expect leading air facility serving new yorkbuses car rental companies limos taxis even water shuttles all come together provide passengers laguardia airport plenty transport
data.meta_description: Located alongside Bowery Bay and Flushing Bay, LaGuardia International Airport  (LGA) is well-equipped with ground transportation options, as you would expect at a leading air facility serving New York.Buses, car rental companies, limos, taxis and even water shuttles all come together to provide passengers of LaGuardia Airport plenty of transport options, meaning that you can easily travel all over New York and beyond, including Bellerose Terrace, Elmont, Great Neck, Jersey City...
